content.prompt: Which of the following describes an overall argument of the excerpt?

choices.label: Slavery is not economically important for the northern colonies.
Slavery is contrary to the ideals of the American Revolution.
Enslaved Africans should be rewarded for their loyalty to Great Britain.
Enslaved Africans should be returned to Africa.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim and/or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
